entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:05 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 2:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.0 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: SW 28 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 after midnight then light overnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
